entry.title: What It Sounds Like
entry.summary:
Author: UltraCaffeinatedIvy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,884Chapters: 11/14Kudos: 109

Summary: Things are mostly looking up for Jason Todd. He’s finally earned a scholarship to Gotham Academy and has a place that actually feels like home. He knows it's not some kind of cosmic reward for getting through a rough past, living through Catherine's addictions, his dad up and disappearing, or any of the other shit he's had to put up with. You get dealt your hand in life, for better or —more likley— worse, and try to make the best of it. Then Dick Grayson steps in. Or Where Pamela Isley adopts Jason Todd. Enrolls him in Gotham Academy and Jason struggles being a normal teenager, having friends and, of course, falls in love with Dick Grayson in the process. A coming of age story.

entry.title: Bodies As Stained Glass
entry.summary:
Author: succeeding

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 160,949Chapters: 29/60Kudos: 904

Summary: Jason Todd's a lot of things— martial arts instructor, vigilante, lady's man— but a babysitter isn't one of them. That's what Bruce asks him to be when Robin, the oldest child of the Wayne family, leaves the Manor and moves to Gotham. She can't be that helpless, right? She's a grown woman. She was Batman's original, and only, sidekick. Surely she doesn't need watching. Turns out, she really does. OR: an AU of Glass, with female Dick Grayson. That one change alters an entire universe. Sequel to 'Impersonation Of Life'. NOTE 12-30-2025: I am back to writing after an injury. This fic will receive regular updates.

entry.title: Common Grounds
entry.summary:
Author: MewSefet

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,116Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 127

Summary: What happens when you accidently start dating your son's English teacher? When Dick and Jason find themselves pushed together on a rainy day in their usual coffee shop, neither of them expect their lives are already intertwined. How casual flirting and mutual interest turns into dating, turns into an identity reveal that neither of them expect, but should have figured out earlier. Eg. the Detective!Dick Grayson/Teacher!Jason Todd fic that no one asked for. Including Jason is Damian's teacher, and Damian is 80% Dick's son and identity shenanigans in a Civillian!AU.

entry.title: Pinned Butterfly
entry.summary:
Author: sarriathmg

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,495Chapters: 5/18Kudos: 298

Summary: Renegade was suave, dangerous, and inevitable. He was everything she feared but was inexorably drawn to. He was also the former Robin, Jason's predecessor, breaking off his path with Batman and the Teen Titans to pursue a life as a mercenary with Deathstroke as his mentor. For months, Jason had dallied and exchanged flirty quips with the villain on the field. But that had all been games. When Jason saw something she shouldn't have one night, she suddenly found herself Renegade's—Dick Grayson's—prisoner. aka. Like the story Renegade but with Jason having always been a girl.

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 211,895Chapters: 45/53Kudos: 1,631

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham. Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave. The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running. Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human. Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.title: Dick bites. It's a problem.
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 121,594Chapters: 30/30Kudos: 501

Summary: Thanks to batsandbirdbrains (Tumblr) it's now my headcanon that Dick bit as Robin.This is a COLLECTION of oneshots, somewhat related around one thing: Dick bites.Mostly Mature for the biting and violence, though the last chapter is PWP (DickJay). “You bite strange men, you get the rinse,” Batman said. “That’s the rule.” Robin tried to twist away, but Batman levered Robin up onto his feet with one hand, the other aiming the peroxide at Robin’s mouth. Robin clamped his lips tight. Batman’s patience snapped. “Open,” he growled. “Now.”“Mh-mh!” Robin kicked, but Batman hoisted him higher, one hand under Robin’s armpit, the other holding his head in place.“You don’t want hepatitis.” Batman said, voice ticking up a notch.Robin stopped struggling, eyes wide. Batman saw the pause, and loosened his grip - only to make Robin wind out of his grip and start running. The man with the bitten arm moaned.“What the fuck is wrong with you?” he managed, voice thick with pain and shock.Robin deadlooped over him, baring his teeth in a wicked, blood-stained grin.“Don’t grab the Robin,” he said. “That’s the first lesson.” Fully written fic, upload every Wednesday and Sunday!

entry.title: Never Pretend
entry.summary:
Author: Zillabird

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,680Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 62

Summary: Dick Grayson was a gold medal figure skater. Until he wasn't. Now he's a hockey player for the Gotham Ravagers, of which Jason Todd is center and captain. Neither of them are sure what to do about it. Dick is stuck with his contract, whether he likes it or not, and Jason needs to get his team on board with the unusual recruit. Out on the ice, somewhere between the life Dick left behind and the controlling machinations of the team owner, is a chance to find a new place to start for both of them.
